selectedVerses.text: As smoke is driven away, so you shall drive them away; as wax melts before fire, so the wicked shall perish before God!
in the streets they wear sackcloth; on the housetops and in the squares everyone wails and melts in tears.
He sends out his word, and melts them; he makes his wind blow and the waters flow.
The Lord GOD of hosts, he who touches the earth and it melts, and all who dwell in it mourn, and all of it rises like the Nile, and sinks again, like the Nile of Egypt;
The river gates are opened; the palace melts away;
